item.description:
Hey Everyone -

just wanted to let you know about a pretty cool event that is happening at Yale.  As part of the North Face Speaker Series, Conrad Anker is coming to Yale to talk about some of his latest adventures.  If you don't know who Conrad Anker is, then look him up.  He's awesome. 

Please note that this is NOT a meetup event, just wanted to let everyone know.  We will still be having our regular Wed. night climbing session at Prime Climb. 

For more information regarding Conrad Anker speaking at Yale - go here:

http://www.thenorthface.com/en_US/get-outdoors/speaker_series/3-conrad-anker/

Best,

Dan
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be scattered all over - come on your own.
item.name: Conrad Anker speaking at Yale w/ the North Face Speaker Series
